thread.title: Spotted: Liverpool trio lift-share to training as Reds prepare for Leicester clash
thread.title_full: Spotted: Liverpool trio lift-share to training as Reds prepare for Leicester clash

title: Spotted: Liverpool trio lift-share to training as Reds prepare for Leicester clash
text: Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership Spotted: Liverpool trio lift-share to training as Reds prepare for Leicester clash PHILIPPE COUTINO was the designated driver as Liverpool stars piled into his car and made their way to training ahead of the Reds' Premier League meeting with Leicester City on Monday (8pm). PUBLISHED: 13:04, Tue, Feb 21, 2017 | UPDATED: 13:46, Tue, Feb 21, 2017 Liverpool trio lift share to training ahead of Leicester clash Tue, February 21, 2017 Liverpool stars are spotted making their way to training at Melwood as the Reds prepare for their Premier League clash with Champions Leicester City on Monday (8pm)
